## Classes

### <a name="mcelog"></a>`mcelog`

Manage mcelog

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `mcelog` class:

* [`package_name`](#package_name)
* [`config_file_path`](#config_file_path)
* [`service_name`](#service_name)
* [`service_ensure`](#service_ensure)
* [`service_enable`](#service_enable)
* [`config_file_content`](#config_file_content)

##### <a name="package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `String`

The name of the package.

##### <a name="config_file_path"></a>`config_file_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

The path of mcelog configuration file.

##### <a name="service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String`

The name of the service.

##### <a name="service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Stdlib::Ensure::Service`

The expected state of the service

##### <a name="service_enable"></a>`service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

Should the service start on boot?

##### <a name="config_file_content"></a>`config_file_content`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Literal string to write to config_file_path.

Default value: ``undef``
